comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Caption says "a few hours after nomination," implying this was taken in 1912

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content:
Good point about the caption!  (At first, I wondered if Wilson's particularly gaunt appearance here would suggest it was taken four years later, in 1916.  But checking historical newspapers confirmed that his 1912 nomination took place July 2, whereas his 1916 nomination took place in June.) 

We'll adjust the title and date in the source description and reload it to Flickr.
